content: knit now as well as numerous self- using yarn a only published designs set up round *k1tbl k1 repeat from * to end ribbing *k1 tbl p1 repeat from * to end you can find kelly mostly on youtube with her repeat ribbing for a further 7 rnds for shortie or 11 rnds knitting podcast where she talks about all her for mid-calf knitting exploits and on patreon with behind the cast off using jenyssuper stretchy bind off or a scenes vlogs and other goodies stretchy cast off of your choice youtube https //www youtube com/@rowrowandkades patreon https //bit ly/patreonkm rowrow and kades page 9 daedalus socks - dk
